alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 10:57PM CDT until June 10 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Collingsworth County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Donley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1056 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Texola to 7 miles north of Quail to 5 miles northwest of Memphis, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Wellington, Shamrock, Mclean, Hedley, Dodson, Lutie, Lelia Lake, Dozier, Lela, Samnorwood and Quail. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
